Ask us anything

FAQs

Can we try Formalize before we buy it?

Yes! You can, of course, try our software for free for 14 days without providing any credit card information. Try out an account by pressing the "Try for free" button or by scheduling a demo.

What is the Formalize Trust Center?

The Trust Center makes it easy for you to document and share all the work you do in relation to compliance and best business practices. Share access to your privacy policies, code of conduct, whistleblowing channel, and much more in your own branded universe.

How many users are included?

You can add as many users as necessary. You can invite both internal and external people, such as law firms or consultants. Once you invite users, they will gain authorized access to the system.

What support do we get in the implementation process?

Our award-winning customer support team is ready to assist you in the process of implementation of Formalize in your organisation. You will be scheduled for an onboarding meeting where we can answer all your questions and help you navigate through the system. However, the platform is user-friendly and easy to use even without our help.
